name: Automaton: Industria Fons
description:
My first game uploaded to itch.io and my first jam game :D

Music by Chris Toro

There might be some audio clipping in the HTML build, if you want to appreciate the music to it's full extent download the game!

Also there is a final boss so stay around to hear the banger of its music theme!

Here's some more images:

----------------------SFX--------------------------------

snare : Spring Spring (OpenGameArt.org)

sfx-collect a nice big strawberry.wav : Spring Spring (OpenGameArt.org)

sfx-checkpoint :Spring Spring (OpenGameArt.org)

Magic_explosion (not original file name) : Mixkit

Laser3 : Kenney (OpenGameArt.org)

coontinousspark.wav : Brian MacIntosh

------------------Font-----------------------------------

Logo font : Joystix Monospace (Google fonts)

Smaller logo font : Made by me!
